biog.entry.electorate.state.name: Senator for Queensland
biog.entry.party.name: Australian Labor Party

parliamentary.service.title: Parliamentary Service
parliamentary.service.para: Elected to the Senate for Queensland 1998 (term began 1.7.1999), 2004 and 2010.

ministerial.appointments.title: Ministerial Appointments
ministerial.appointments.para: Minister for Human Services from 3.12.07 to 9.6.09.
Special Minister of State from 9.6.09 to 14.9.10.
Minister for Agriculture, Fisheries and Forestry from 14.9.10 to 1.7.13.
Minister Assisting the Attorney-General on Queensland Floods Recovery from 26.1.11 to 1.7.13.

committee.service.title: Committee Service
committee.service.para: Senate Standing: Publications from 9.8.99 to 4.10.00; Regulations and Ordinances from 9.8.99 to 1.7.02; Selection of Bills from 17.8.00 to 11.2.02 and from 1.7.02 to 8.2.12; Procedure from 13.2.02 to 15.11.04, from 7.9.05 to 11.12.05 and from 14.5.08 to 7.2.12; Library from 1.7.02 to 15.11.04.

Senate Legislative and General Purpose Standing: Legal and Constitutional: References Committee from 9.8.99 to 1.7.02, from 4.12.03 to 1.3.04, from 1.7.05 to 11.9.06 and from 12.11.13 and Legislation Committee from 1.7.02 to 11.5.05; Legal and Constitutional Affairs from 11.9.06 to 11.2.08; Finance and Public Administration: References Committee from 1.3.04 to 15.11.04 and from 1.7.14 and Legislation Committee from 12.2.15.
Senate Select: Ministerial Discretion in Migration Matters from 23.6.03 to 31.3.04; Certain Aspects of Queensland Government Administration related to Commonwealth Government Affairs from 1.10.14.
Joint Statutory: Australian Crime Commission from 1.7.05 to 27.3.07; Intelligence and Security from 12.12.13 to 16.7.14.
Joint Standing: Treaties from 9.8.99 to 1.7.02 and from 4.12.13; Foreign Affairs, Defence and Trade from 1.7.14.

parliamentary.party.positions.title: Parliamentary Party Positions
parliamentary.party.positions.para: Deputy Opposition Whip in the Senate from 17.8.00 to 22.11.01.
Manager of Opposition Business in the Senate from 12.2.02 to 17.10.07.
Manager of Government Business in the Senate from 12.2.08 to 14.12.11.
Parliamentary Secretary to the Shadow Attorney-General from 25.11.01; and Parliamentary Secretary to the Shadow Minister for Homeland Security from 8.12.03 to 26.10.04.

Member, Opposition Shadow Ministry from 22.10.04 to 3.12.07. Shadow Minister for Justice and Customs from 26.10.04 to 9.3.07; Citizenship and Multicultural Affairs from 26.10.04 to 24.6.05; Shadow Attorney-General from 9.3.07 to 3.12.07.

party.positions.title: Party Positions
party.positions.para: Convener, ALP Economic and Industrial Relations Committee 1993-96; Convener, Employment, Training and Industrial Relations Committee 1996-99.

quals.work.pre.parliament.title: Qualifications and Occupation before entering Federal Parliament
quals.work.pre.parliament.para: Management and Industrial Relations Certificate (Kangaroo Point TAFE).
Cadet Industrial Inspector 1978-80; Assistant Industrial Inspector 1980-82; Industrial Inspector 1982-88.
Industrial Advocate, Australian Workers' Union (Qld) 1988-93; Senior Industrial Advocate 1993-99.

military.service.title: Military Service
military.service.para: 2nd Lieutenant 5/11 Field Regiment Royal Australian Artillery (Reserve).
